Trade/Device Name(s): Hemoglobin Variants System on Newborn Hemoglobin System with GDM and HbReview Software
Hemoglobin Variants System on Newborn Screening System with GDM and HbReview Software
Specimen Type(s): Neonatal blood eluted from dried blood spots
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Workstation with Genetic Disease Management (GDM) software
Methodologies: Pattern assignment using GDM and HbReview software
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bio-Rad Hemoglobin Variants System with Newborn Hemoglobin System, GDM, and HbReview Software for qualitative screening of hemoglobin variants in neonatal dried blood spot samples using HPLC
Indications for Use Summary: For professional laboratory use as a qualitative screen to isolate and identify inherently determined abnormal (S, D, C, E) and normal (F, A) hemoglobin types in neonatal blood samples collected on filter paper using HPLC
